post.text: Join me in Ocala, Florida for a few minutes- look at this amazing MOVEMENT! Remember- this is our LAST CHANCE to take back our country -- it is time to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN!!

comment.author: Sara
comment.text: Send all the stinking Muslim Syrian refugees home please build that wall!!!!!!!!!

replies.author: Colten
replies.text: Jawohl!! Build wall! Or..better gas chamber! HEIL!!

replies.author: Colten
replies.text: holy crap! my comment was ironic. after your reaction my hope for trumpster-brains is definitely gone

replies.author: Darby
replies.text: Run-on sentence, but anyway, the refugees are on our side of the border, genius.
